Create_Custom_Message
Carrying_Out_Test_Campaign_Message
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @Test_Custom_Message_SMS_Bulk_4 @Test_Custom_Message_SMS_Bulk scenario: Carrying out test campaign Message given I am on the message creation page "Bulk SMS" in "SMS" ... passed in 49.92s e when I enter a valid campaign ID ... passed in 3.196s when I create a custom message with the wildcards ... passed in 13.55s when I verify my message ... passed in 0.007828s when I write the number for the test ... passed in 1.168s when I click on the "Verify Cost" button to continue ... passed in 6.383s when I see the cost of the message ... passed in 0.021s when I click on the "send" button and confirm to continue ... passed in 3.681s when I am see the confirmation alert, "The message was successfully sent" in "(//div[@class='ant-notification-notice-description'])[1]" ... passed in 4.317s when I click on the "next" button to continue ... passed in 3.372s then I am redirected to the summary page ... passed in 3.003s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
